name: The Sinister Den
description:
Welcome to the Sinister Den!

This is a text based mystery horror with a few puzzles involved. This was a first attempt at a text based game. 

How to Play / Setup

1. Download the file and unzip.

2. Launch "The Sinister Den.exe"

3. Read how to play in game

4. Win the game

Enjoy and leave your feedback in the comments!
